changelog:
> Podify App Change Log

Version v0.0.1 (First Official Release)

Features:

  • Efficient organization of local audio files into a user-friendly library.
  • Tracking of playback history to keep record of listened audio.
  • Lightweight design, ensuring the app won't burden your device.
  • Adherence to Material 3 design standards, providing a sleek and intuitive interface.
  • Compatibility with Android version 6 and above.

Permissions:

  • Storage Access: Required for accessing the phone's storage for local audio files.
  • Notification Permission: Needed for displaying notifications.

Enhancements:

  • This marks the first official release of Podify.
  • The app may contain bugs, issues, and shortcomings in its initial version.
  • Users are encouraged to provide feedback, share opinions, suggest enhancements, and report issues on our

>GitHub Issues page.

Additional Features (Not Yet Implemented):

  • Background Operation: The app is planned to continue working in the background even after being removed from the taskbar.
  • Online Audio Browsing: A feature to browse and discover online audio content is in the works.
  • Notification Compatibility: Notifications may not appear for users with Android versions below 8. This will be addressed in future updates.

Note: This change log reflects the features and state of the app as of version v0.0.1.
